articles.author: AP
articles.title: In a shock for Europe, anti-Islam populist Wilders registers huge win in Dutch elections - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The result puts him in line to lead talks to possibly become the country’s first hard-right prime minister of the Netherlands. | World News
articles.content: The far-right, anti-Islam populist Geert Wilders was headed for a massive parliamentary election victory Wednesday in one of the biggest political upsets in Dutch politics since World War II, and one… [+4705 chars]
